review_data.title: Excellent Food, Generous Portions, Friendly Service and Nice Athmosphere
review_data.content: This is a fairly recently opened Indian restaurant in a really nice restaurant. The place has multiple rooms and the feeling is like eating in someone living room, supported by the very friendly staff. The cook frequently walks around and chats with the customers about...More

review_data.title: Best Butter Chicken in Town
review_data.content: Nette Bedienung, super Essen. Der Koch kommt jeweils persönlich vorbei. Spannede Speisekarte, von Veganer bis Fleischtiger wird hier jeder satt....More

review_data.title: Best Indian Restaurant In Zurich
review_data.content: Easily the best Indian food in Zurich! Freshly cooked curries with the most authentic, wonderful taste to them. Service was also excellent. We will be back!

review_data.title: Zu teuer

review_data.title: Authentisch, freundliche, jederzeit wieder.
review_data.content: Authentische, sehr feine Gerichte. Äusserst freundliche, aufmerksame Bedienung. Tolle Location mit schöner idyllischer Terrasse. Jederzeit gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Super Authentic Indian Tandoori (BBQ) food
review_data.content: Yesterday was my first experience. Very happening place, very good ambience.Now let's talk about food. The nonveg and veg grill starter iteams are quite good in terms of quality and taste. These starters are perfect for those who eat spicy. The nonveg and veg are...More
